products.name: The Sport Duffle
products.brandedName: Béis The Sport Duffle
products.description: The Sport Duffle The Sport Duffle Nylon exterior with textile lining. Made in China. Dual top zipper closure. One main compartment Dual large elasticized slip pockets. Large interior zipper pocket and dual mesh zipper pockets Includes a dirt bag for dirty clothing, shoes, etc.. Side elasticized slip pocket Front cargo zipper pocket. Detachable and adjustable shoulder strap Hidden padded backpack straps on bottom. Measures approx 17 W x 10 H x 8.5 D. BEIS-WY350. BEIS124687. After countless trips and Shaycations, Shay Mitchell realized that she wanted to create amazing, affordable pieces for travelers like herself who are inspired to seek new places, meet new people, and share the world. BIS - pronounced base - began with the promise to give everyone the opportunity to pack up their stuff and hit the road with bags and accessories that wouldn't break the bank. From the gym to Jaipur, BIS will never compromise on functionality or looking selfie-ready cool.

products.name: x REVOLVE Jasmine Mini Dress
products.brandedName: Bronx and Banco x REVOLVE Jasmine Mini Dress
products.description: x REVOLVE Jasmine Mini Dress x REVOLVE Jasmine Mini Dress Self: 80% viscose 20% cotton Lining: 95% polyester 5% elastane. Made in China. Dry clean only. Partially lined. Exposed back zipper closure. Framed skirt. Organza fabric with tonal 3D florals Garment is made with a semi-sheer fabric, undergarments can show through. BROR-WD714. BB-19-014Y. Launched in 2009, Bronx and Banco encapsulates a sophisticated, chic and sexy design signature with a playful sensibility that reflects the impeccable style of the label's Founder and Creative Director, Natalie DeBanco. With a strong love of all things sartorial and a rich family history that is immersed within the international fashion industry, Natalie identified a gap in the market for high-end, affordable, classic and chic clothing that would be the best friend of the Australian career girl who can turn her outfits from day to night with the addition of a designer heel. It was in Sydney's iconic Bondi Beach that this idea turned into a reality and Bronx and Banco was born.
